title: Sanzoku no Musume Ronja
alternative_title: Ronja Rövardotter, 山賊の娘ローニャ
description: Ronja is the only daughter of Mattis, the chief of a tribe of bandits who live in a huge castle in the forest. The story follows Ronja as she encounters mystical creatures, makes friends with another young child like herself, and experiences life in the forest.
